title: Heimerdinger is one of those champions
body: That can either bully you in lane all day long or play so safe you cant do anything. I want this fixed. There needs to be some sort of way of tackling this problem. It isn't fair for someone to get the best of both worlds by getting to bully and/or remain extremely safe consistently

replies.body:
He used to be balanced by the number of turrets he could have early game. If you could break his toys he was useless.

Now he has an unlimited supply. They neglected to up the mana cost on them when they gave him unlimited turrets.

>If you could break his toys he was useless

That's not balanced, that's feast or famine.
That's 100% balanced. Seek counterplay, use it, achieve main goal. That'd be like saying zhonyas on zed ult is feast or famine. It isn't, it's just counterplay
